attributes.action: Set strict limits for earnings of MPs after they leave office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government is being run by career minded politicians who only care about their personal wealth, to stop this, after a politician has left office their earnings past a limit (a limit of the same amount as the national average income.) should be 100% taxed.
There security could be additionally funded but only in justifiable circumstances. 
This will prove politicians really have the best interests of the country in their hearts and not there greedy mouths in the trough.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
